SAMPLEFILE.description: The path to the sample file provided to the pipeline. This is a tab-separated file with one sample per line. Each line should contain a sample id, path to bam file, path to barcodes file (in that order!). Example available here: https://github.com/cellgeni/nf-souporcell/tree/nextflow-tower/examples

sangerID.description: Your Sanger ID i.e user99 (NOT your email).

K.description: The number of donors in the samples. All samples must contain the same number of donors.

known_genotypes.description: Whether to use the known_genotypes option. The requires a VCF with the known genotypes in it. The number of genotypes must match the number of donors supplied in the K parameter.

bam_on_irods.description: Tells pipeline whether to look for the bam file on IRODS or the FARM (default yes means look on IRODS).

barcodes_on_irods.description: Tells pipeline whether to look for the gzipped barcodes file on IRODS or the FARM (default yes means look on IRODS).

reference_fasta.description: Path to  genome fasta for pipeline to use (by default GRCh38 2020A is used).

vcf.description: Path to vcf file used for souporcel (default is 2p 1k genome with chr nomenclature).

skip_remap.description: Whether to skip remapping in souporcell pipeline (default true means skip remapping).

no_umi.description: Tells the pipeline whether the BAM files have a UMI tag (default false means BAM file has UMI tag)
